content: Over the months, Dennis and I will chat in his tiny chapel, and I will ask numerous questions, and he’ll do his best to answer. He’ll give me a book he loves from a Protestant minister and with a sly smile tell me to keep quiet that he’s reading Protestant literature. Eventually, he’ll introduce me to one of my favorite authors who happens to be a Jesuit Priest named Brennan Manning. Brennan is an alcoholic. So is Dennis. A fact he doesn’t shy away from.
